Uses of Class
oracle.sql.NUMBER

  • Packages that use NUMBER 
    Package Description
    oracle.jdbc
    Beginning in Oracle9i, the Oracle extensions to JDBC are captured in the package oracle.jdbc.
    oracle.sql
    A package of classes that represent java SQL types and Oracle specific SQL types.
